wikipedia_page.main: This Unique Museum is the pseudonym of Benjamin Fitton who is an English singer-songwriter. He released his first album in 2006 after winning a best unsigned band competition on London's XFM Radio. He has released a number of records and a handful of EPs, with the former being recorded as Chapters, which are original tracks and the later as Installments, which are slower reinterpretations of alternative rock songs.

response: Benjamin Fitton is an English singer songwriter. He released his first album under the pseudonym of This Unique Museum in 2006 after winning a best unsigned band competition on London's XFM Radio.
